sourcesContent:
lista-itens works!

import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-lista-itens', templateUrl: './lista-itens.component.html', styleUrls: ['./lista-itens.component.css'] }) export class ListaItensComponent { public novoItem: string = '' public listaItens: string[] = [] AdicionarItem() { this.listaItens.push(this.novoItem); this.novoItem = '' } }
